text:
Energies of negativity cannot sustain in the presence of high vibrational frequency & pure, bright light. It may be difficult for beginners to believe, but truth is, that the negativity comes from within your own being. You will find that as you work on yourself (focusing inward, dissipating pain of traumas, fears keeping you from shining your inner light at its strongest and best), these negative demons naturally disappear. When you donâ€™t fear them, they cease having power over you. It is when we donâ€™t face our deepest fears & heal our past pains, our shadow sides haunt us.
Being still is in a way being present with all that is you, the good & the uncomfortable. Begin to love & forgive yourself in all the ways, and you will find inner peace. The road can be very in comfortable at times but you will experience magicâ€¦ and support in the strangest of placesâ€¦ for we all have guides, ancestors, angels and so many more forces of unconditional love that await to be called on to assist in the progression to self-love and healing acceptance.
You are headed in the right direction! An excellent way to begin your journey of self-healing is through meditation. ğŸ™‚ Donâ€™t worry, nothing can hurt you there! Altho, you may sometimes cry. Tears are a good way to release toxins & tension!
Remember, in the silent darkness of your mind â€” the negativity you experience in meditation is only YOUR interpretation, YOUR own fears, that you have FULL CONTROL over facing, acknowledging and letting go. In doing the work, you will regain your sense of personal power & freedom.
As you do your work, as you meditate, as you dream, anytime you get scared, think of something you love dearlyâ€¦ maybe a beloved pet, a piece of artwork, someplace in natureâ€¦ amplify & surround yourself in that feeling of love. Make it feel really really really BIG. What you feel in this is your heart light. Allow that light in your heart center to grow brighter and brighter with a complete sense of unconditional love and supportâ€¦
You may imagine the love of nature healing you below like roots of trees, grounding. You may also imagine the love of the skies shining itâ€™s pure, loving R[redacted_name]s over your head & shouldersâ€¦ Imagine both of these healing energies meeting up in your heart center, amplifying & opening that beautiful heart light of yours â€” for the brighter your light, the lesser the darkness. âœ¨
Use this in times of fear, for you must not fear as fear is fuel for continued hiding from your self & your issues. Make a commitment to face fear eye to eye & you will find, with the natural power of love light within, the negativity is NO THING.
No thang at all. ğŸ˜‰
Being deeply grateful for the experience to learn & grow, to expand beyond the constructs of fear.
â€œThe only thing we have to fear is fear itself.â€ â€”FDR
Wishing you the best on your journey. ğŸ™ğŸ’šğŸŒ
â€”Melis[redacted_name]and music! Use music & move your body (dance, stretch, exercise) to raise vibrations too!
